data.name: GoLab 2019 • Lightning talks
data.description: The International Conference on Go in Florence

relatedRecords.name: GoGoConf 2019
relatedRecords.description: GoGoConf is an international Go (Golang) developers conference that takes place in Krakow, Poland on October 25th. Have an opportunity to meet other Go developers, have a chat with speakers from companies like solarisBank, Allegro, Filestack, BBVA and many others.

relatedRecords.name: Accessibility Days 2020
relatedRecords.description:
